artGallery.title: Art Gallery
artGallery.description: Appreciate and learn about world-famous paintings

sidebarTips.explore: Explore Art History: This is a great way to explore collections from world-class museums.
sidebarTips.filter: Combine Filters: Try combining different filters, such as '19th century', 'painting', and 'Europe'.
sidebarTips.search: Keyword Search: Use 'Assisted Search' to find specific themes like 'cat', 'boat', or 'sunflower'.

artGallery.searchPlaceholder: Search within filtered results, e.g.: Monet, cat
artGallery.noResults: No artworks found matching the criteria.

ideaGenerator.title: Idea Generator

sidebarTips.inspire: Spark Creativity: This is the best starting point when you don't know what to draw.
sidebarTips.theme: Theme Words: Try entering themes like 'festival', 'animals', 'space', or 'dreams'.
sidebarTips.recreate: Re-creation: AI-generated examples are just references, encourage students to create their own based on them!

ideaGenerator.subtitle: Enter a theme you want to draw, and AI will generate custom line art materials and provide teacher-like feedback on your work.
ideaGenerator.inputPlaceholder: e.g.: A party in the forest, Future cars...
ideaGenerator.step2: Step 2: Submit Your Work for Review
ideaGenerator.uploadWork: Click to Take Photo / Upload Work

moodPainting.title: Mood Painting

sidebarTips.care: Care First: This is a psychological care tool designed for students (especially left-behind children).
sidebarTips.guide: Emotional Guidance: Encourage students to choose their real mood, AI will provide therapeutic drawing ideas.
sidebarTips.teaching: Teaching Application: Can be used at the beginning or end of art class as an 'emotional check-in' or 'emotional organization' session.

moodPainting.subtitle: (Integrating art and psychology to guide students in expressing emotions through drawing)
moodPainting.themeQuestion: What theme would you like to draw?
moodPainting.themePlaceholder: e.g.: My home, A tree, Future me

lineColoring.title: Line Coloring

sidebarTips.style: Diverse Styles: Try keywords like 'watercolor', 'oil painting', 'anime style', or 'cyberpunk'.
sidebarTips.color: Color Words: Use 'bright colors', 'soft tones', or 'vintage colors' to guide AI.
sidebarTips.teaching: Teaching Application: Have students upload the same line art but use different style prompts to compare results.

lineColoring.uploadError: Please upload a line art image

styleWorkshop.title: Style Workshop

sidebarTips.portrait: Portrait Transformation: Select this mode to preserve facial features. Try '3D fairy tale' or 'Chinese traditional painting' styles.
sidebarTips.artistic: Artistic Redraw: Suitable for landscapes or objects. Upload an ordinary photo, enter 'transform to Van Gogh starry night style', and see AI's magic!
sidebarTips.teaching: Teaching Application: Let students experience both modes separately to understand the application differences of 'style transfer' in different scenarios.

styleWorkshop.subtitle: Explore AI Art Magic: Give Your Photos a Unique Artistic Soul Instantly
styleWorkshop.portraitAlert: This mode focuses on portrait processing and will preserve facial features as much as possible.
styleWorkshop.artisticAlert: This mode is suitable for landscapes, still life, or scenarios requiring significant style changes.
styleWorkshop.instructionPlaceholder: e.g.: Transform to Van Gogh style, snowy scene, cyberpunk effect...
styleWorkshop.uploadStyleError: Please upload a style reference image

artQA.title: Art Encyclopedia

sidebarTips.start: Start Conversation: You can ask any art question, like 'What is Impressionism?'
sidebarTips.followup: Deep Dive: 'Little Art' teacher remembers your conversation. You can follow up: 'Who are the famous Impressionist painters?'
sidebarTips.clear: Clear History: If you want to start a completely new topic, you can click the 'Clear Conversation' button.

artQA.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your art teacher, Little Art. What art knowledge are you interested in?
artQA.placeholder: Ask Little Art any art question...

suggestions.inkPainting: What are the characteristics of ink wash painting?

apiKeyModal.title: Welcome to ArtSpark AI

apiKeyModal.securityNote: . The key will be securely stored in your local browser.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Your suggestions drive us forward, feel free to share your thoughts.
feedback.contentPlaceholder: Please describe the issue or suggestion you have...
feedback.contactPlaceholder: Leave your phone or email for us to reply
feedback.submitSuccess: Thank you for your feedback, we will process it as soon as possible!

validation.feedbackTooShort: Feedback is too short, please provide more details

settings.title: Settings
settings.dashscopeApiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter your DashScope API Key
settings.dashscopeApiKeyTooltip: Access credential for calling Alibaba Cloud DashScope API (sk-xxx).
settings.chatModelTooltip: Used for 'Art Q&A' and 'Creative Idea Generation'.
settings.vlModelTooltip: Used for all tools that require 'image upload' for analysis, such as 'AI Smart Coloring'.
settings.imageModelTooltip: Used for all 'image generation' tools, such as 'Creative Style Workshop'.
settings.imageModelAutoSelectDesc: Vision and image generation models for DashScope platform will be automatically selected on the backend, no need to choose here.
settings.studentAgeTooltip: AI will adjust the complexity and tone of its responses based on the selected age.

footer.teacherGuideText: Use 'AI Smart Coloring' to help students practice color matching. Use 'Style Workshop' and 'AI Self-Portrait' to inspire students' creativity and imagination. 'Art Q&A' can be used as a classroom encyclopedia. The new 'Art Gallery' can be used for masterpiece appreciation classes.
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 ArtSpark AI - Intelligent Art Teaching Assistant Project
